<<<<<<< HEAD
The treasure of true loue or A liuely description of the loue of Christ vnto his spouse, whom in loue he hath clensed in his blood from sinne, and made a royall priesthood vnto his Father. / By Thomas Tuke, preacher of the word.. Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.
[8], 277, [2] p.
Printed by Thomas Creede, and are to be solde by Thomas Archer., London : 1608..
Epistle dedicatory dated: Ian. 23. 1607. Errata: p. [1] at end. Imperfect: faded print, with considerable loss of text. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
=======

[8], 277, [2] p.
Printed by Thomas Creede, and are to be solde by Thomas Archer., London : 1608..
Epistle dedicatory dated: Ian. 23. 1607. Errata: p. [1] at end. Imperfect: faded print, with considerable loss of text. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
